title: Avira Antivirus Pro 2015 v 15.0.8.624
description:
You do banking transactions at home or online purchase? So Antivirus Pro is the ideal tool to secure your online payments, prevent leakage of the details of your credit card and block spoofed Web sites that masquerade as shopping carts or banks portals. Safety award-winning Avira, manufactured in Germany, provides complete protection against all types of malware including viruses, Trojans, worms, ransomware, spyware and adware.

Features:
- Security made in Germany
- The Mechanism virus protects against all types of malware including viruses, Trojans, and spyware.
- Heuristic analysis detects polymorphic threats based on their behavior patterns and blocks.
- The Cloud Protection is our early warning system, which protects from zero-day threats as they arise in real time.
